name: Mirrored (JugieNoob)
description:
Discord | Twitter | Youtube

Description

A short puzzle game where you control two characters, but with a twist, one character moves opposite to the other.

Gameplay
  • Control two characters at once!
  • 5 Levels
  • A co-op mode
What's to come
  • Discord Rich Presence
  • More Levels

    And more!
